document_data.name: Augury
document_data.mainbody: '''''Augury''''' ({{Pronounce|AG|ur|ee|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}|audio=augury.ogg}}) was a [[divination]] spell that told if a proposed action would have a positive or negative outcome.
document_data.Effects: After the [[Second Sundering]], the spell was altered little: after casting a second time or more before a long rest the spell became about 25% more unreliable. When the wrong answer was to be given, the spell gave any one of the answers.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s, a set of marked sticks, bones, or similar tokens of at least 25 [[gp]] value. The [[shugenja]] version of this spell required a pair of straight sticks from a willow or carved bones.
